sentences.en: A newer anti-HIV drug called pyridinone caused HIV to mutate into a form which could not reproduce or infect new cells.
sentences.cn: 一种叫作吡啶酮的新型抗艾滋病药物能促使艾滋病毒变异，使其不能繁殖，也不会再感染新的细胞。

sentences.en: All donated blood is screened for HIV.
sentences.cn: 所献血液一律要经过人体免疫缺陷病毒的筛查。

sentences.en: Biomedical research will enable many individuals infected with HIV to live longer, more comfortable lives.
sentences.cn: 生物医学研究将会使许多艾滋病患者延长生命、提高生命质量。

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 这两种药物都可以延缓艾滋病病情发展，但是都不能治愈这种疾病。

sentences.en: But could slowing HIV be as simple as using an inexpensive spermicide?
sentences.cn: 但是,降低HIV能像用一种廉价杀精剂那么简单 吗 ?

sentences.en: Heterosexual contact is responsible for the bulk of HIV transmission.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒大半是经异性性接触传播的。

sentences.en: His estimate of half a million HIV positive cases was based on an extrapolation of the known incidence of the virus.
sentences.cn: 他估计有50万个HIV阳性病例，这是根据已知的病毒感染率作出的推论。

sentences.en: HIV positive/negative (=having or not having HIV in your body)
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒检测呈阳性的/阴性的

sentences.en: I have patients who are HIV-positive and asymptomatic.
sentences.cn: 我的一些病人艾滋病病毒检测呈阳性，但却无任何体征。

sentences.en: I translated this as a mad desire to lock up every single person with HIV.
sentences.cn: 我把这点理解为想把每个艾滋病病毒携带者都关起来的疯狂欲望。

sentences.en: It is also uncertain at this stage whether or not the devices will test for HIV.
sentences.cn: 目前也还不确定，在现阶段这个装置是否将会用于检测艾滋病（HIV）。

sentences.en: Next generation Fusion inhibitors like T - 20 may soon fight HIV.
sentences.cn: 下一代融合抑制物 T -20可以迅速攻击艾滋病病毒.

sentences.en: That is why we are continuing to invest in the fight against HIV/AIDS.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么我们一直与艾滋病毒和艾滋病斗争的原因。

sentences.en: The FDA approved a new anti - HIV drug.
sentences.cn: FDA已批准了一种新的 抗 艾滋病病毒药.

sentences.en: There's a time lag between infection with HIV and developing AIDS.
sentences.cn: 从感染艾滋病病毒到病发有一段滞后期。

sentences.en: You can contract Aids if your bodily fluids come into contact with the bodily fluids of someone else who is infected with HIV.
sentences.cn: 如果你的体液与染有HIV者 的体液接触,你就会染上艾滋病.

trans.tran_cn: hiver (French=winter)（法语）冬季，Human Immunodeficiency Virus艾滋病病毒
人体免疫缺损病毒（艾滋病病毒）；（Human Immunodeficiency Virus）的缩写
trans.tran_en: HIV is a virus which reduces people's resistance to illness and can cause AIDS
